title: Diary of Steve the Noob 10
description: This Minecraft diary is 9,000 words long with 18 pictures to accompany the story.Things are finally settling down for Steve. He is back home and Cindy is cured, but she's stuck in sleep mode. The village is beginning to grow and will need Steve's help to keep it safe. There is no break for our hero because a hero's work is never done, even if that hero is a noob. Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
